input.code: This page is the main access point to the course material. Note that every page allows you to toggle between a text and a presentation mode. In the lectures we will mostly use the presentation view, but both are essentially based on the same content.This is the content of the course: * [Logistics](/template/statnlpbook/04_compgi19/00_logistics) * [Introduction](/template/statnlpbook/04_compgi19/01_intro) * [Scala Crash Course](/template/statnlpbook/00_intro_to_scala) * Lectures * [Tokenization](/template/statnlpbook/01_tasks/00_tokenization) * [Language Models](/template/statnlpbook/01_tasks/0x_languagemodels)
